Sentence.value: However, during the early stages of infection, your body may only produce a few antibodies, which the blood test may miss.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: However, during the early stages of [[infection|C0009450]], your body may only produce a few [[antibodies|C0003241]], which the blood test may miss.

Sentence.value: An abnormal result means antibodies to B. anthracis have been detected and you may have anthrax disease.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: An abnormal result means antibodies to [[B. anthracis|C0004589]] have been detected and you may have [[anthrax disease|C0003175]].

Sentence.value: However, some people come in contact with the bacteria and do not develop the disease.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: However, some people come in contact with the [[bacteria|C0004611]] and do not develop the [[disease|C0012634]].
